Text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Author: Steve Jobs

Text: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Author: Babe Ruth

Text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Text: Always do what you are afraid to do.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Text: Some mistakes take us to the right place.
Author: Buddha

Text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Author: George Eliot

Text: Change. But start slowly, because direction is more important than speed.
Author: Paulo Coelho
